title: 323: The “Teaching Kids about Santa Claus” Debate + High School Nickname Trauma + Goals for 2022
itunes:title: 323: The “Teaching Kids about Santa Claus” Debate + High School Nickname Trauma + Goals for 2022
description:
The Tangential Broads are here and it’s time to giggle and then get deep! First they discuss the meanings of their names, Macaulay Culkin, high school nicknames that stick forever, getting harassed in high school, and botox updates! Then they talk about Ember’s Hogwarts experience, Jess’ parenting debacle, thoughts on teaching kids about Santa Claus/Tooth Fairy/etc, honest parenting questions, their goals in 2022, when “self care” makes you feel more pressure than care, and more!

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
